entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 p.m. PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
